TreasuryStockValueAcquiredCostMethod.description: Equity impact of the cost of common and preferred stock that were repurchased during the period. Recorded using the cost method.

UnrealizedGainLossOnDerivatives.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Derivatives
UnrealizedGainLossOnDerivatives.description: The net change in the difference between the fair value and the carrying value, or in the comparative fair values, of derivative instruments, including options, swaps, futures, and forward contracts, held at each balance sheet date, that was included in earnings for the period.

UnrealizedGainLossOnForeignCurrencyDeriv.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Foreign Currency Derivatives, Net, before Tax
UnrealizedGainLossOnForeignCurrencyDeriv.description: Amount of net unrealized gain (loss) related to the change in fair value of foreign currency exchange rate derivatives designated as cash flow hedging instruments. Recorded in accumulated other comprehensive income to the extent that the cash flow hedge is determined to be effective.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Decrease Resulting from Prior Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions taken in prior period tax returns.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Decrease Resulting from Settlements with Taxing Authorities
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from settlements with taxing authorities.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Income Tax Penalties and Interest Accrued
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.description: Amount accrued for interest on an underpayment of income taxes and penalties related to a tax position claimed or expected to be claimed in the tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Income Tax Penalties and Interest Expense
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.description: Amount of expense for interest on an underpayment of income taxes and penalties related to a tax position claimed or expected to be claimed in the tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Acquisition
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from acquisitions.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Current Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions that have been or will be taken in current period tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Prior Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions taken in prior period tax returns.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsInterestOnIncomeT.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Interest on Income Taxes Accrued
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsInterestOnIncomeT.description: Amount of interest expense accrued for an underpayment of income taxes.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsPeriodIncreaseDec.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Period Increase (Decrease)
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsPeriodIncreaseDec.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in unrecognized tax benefits attributable to uncertain tax positions taken in tax returns.

ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.label: Valuation Allowance, Deferred Tax Asset, Increase (Decrease), Amount
ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the valuation allowance for a specified deferred tax asset.

WeightedAverageDiscountRatePercent.label: Weighted Average Discount Rate, Percent (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
WeightedAverageDiscountRatePercent.description: The average discount rate applied to insurance contracts to determine future policy benefits to be paid to or on behalf of policyholders.

WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.label: Weighted Average Number Diluted Shares Outstanding Adjustment
WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.description: The sum of dilutive potential common shares or units used in the calculation of the diluted per-share or per-unit computation.

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfShareOutstandingB.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic and Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfShareOutstandingB.description: Average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating basic and diluted earnings per share (EPS).

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesIssuedBasic.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Issued, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesIssuedBasic.description: This element represents the weighted average total number of shares issued throughout the period including the first (beginning balance outstanding) and last (ending balance outstanding) day of the period before considering any reductions (for instance, shares held in treasury) to arrive at the weighted average number of shares outstanding. Weighted average relates to the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares have been issued and outstanding to the total time in that period. Such concept is used in determining the weighted average number of shares outstanding for purposes of calculating earnings per share (basic).

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesTreasurySto.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares, Treasury Stock
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesTreasurySto.description: Number of shares of treasury stock determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that treasury shares have been outstanding to the total time in that period. Treasury stock is stock that the Entity has issued but subsequently reacquired.

OperatingLeaseExpense.label: Operating Lease, Expense
OperatingLeaseExpense.description: Amount of operating lease expense. Excludes sublease income.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cash Flow Hedge, Gain (Loss), after Reclassification and Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.description: Amount, after tax and reclassification, of gain (loss) from derivative instrument designated and qualifying as cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cash Flow Hedge, Gain (Loss), before Reclassification, after Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.description: Amount, after tax and before reclassification, of gain (loss) from derivative instrument designated and qualifying as cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cash Flow Hedge, Gain (Loss), Reclassification, after Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.description: Amount, after tax, of reclassification of gain (loss) from accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) for derivative instrument designated and qualifying as cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness.

PaymentForContingentConsiderationLiabili.label: Payment for Contingent Consideration Liability, Financing Activities
PaymentForContingentConsiderationLiabili.description: Amount of cash outflow, not made soon after acquisition date of business combination, to settle contingent consideration liability up to amount recognized at acquisition date, including, but not limited to, measurement period adjustment and less amount paid soon after acquisition date.

ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyHeldForSale.label: Proceeds from Sale of Property Held-for-sale
ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyHeldForSale.description: The cash inflow from the sale of formerly productive land held for sale, anything permanently fixed to it, including buildings, structures on it, and so forth.

CostOfGoodsAndServicesSoldDepreciationAn.label: Cost, Depreciation and Amortization
CostOfGoodsAndServicesSoldDepreciationAn.description: Amount of expense for allocation of cost of tangible and intangible assets over their useful lives directly used in production of good and rendering of service.

ProceedsFromSaleMaturityAndCollectionOfS.label: Proceeds from Sale, Maturity and Collection of Short-term Investments
ProceedsFromSaleMaturityAndCollectionOfS.description: The cash inflow from sales, maturities, prepayments, calls and collections of all investments, including securities and other assets, having ready marketability and intended by management to be liquidated, if necessary, within the current operating cycle. Includes cash flows from securities classified as trading securities that were acquired for reasons other than sale in the short-term.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAndFinanceLease.label: Property, Plant, and Equipment and Finance Lease Right-of-Use Asset, after Accumulated Depreciation and Amortization
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAndFinanceLease.description: Amount, after accumulated depreciation and amortization, of property, plant, and equipment and finance lease right-of-use asset.
